attributes.action: Stop the Demolition of The Willows Long Marston
attributes.additional_details: Stop the demolition of The Willows, Long Marston, a charming thatched property, renovated 8 years ago to an exceptional high standard, to make way for a development of 15 houses on old ridge and furrow orchard, building on open countryside.  Entrance on a bad bend, opposite two Grade 2 listed buildings, will spoil the surroundings and out of keeping on the street scene.Permission has been granted for three housing developments so no need for yet more houses to be built within 200 yards of each other. Drainage and sewers already under strain.
